channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MicroStrategy paused its bitcoin-buying spree last week
Investing veteran sees market pricing Maseratis like Fords — tune in at noon
Stock-market losses widen as details of Japan and South Korea tariffs emerge
Dow industrials’ intraday decline now exceeds 300 points — live updates
Rep. Mark Green resigns from Congress, leaving Speaker Johnson with an even narrower Republican majority in the House
item.description: Rep. Mark Green said he was returning to the private sector to start his own business, without sharing details about the business.

item.title: Trump says Musk has gone 'off the rails' after Tesla CEO announces new political party
item.description: Elon Musk said in a post Saturday on X that he had set up the "American Party" to compete against the Republican and Democratic parties.

item.title: Trump administration teases more trade deals, but shifting tariff deadlines raise new questions
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent declined to rule out the prospect of serving as the next chair of the Federal Reserve if President Donald Trump asks ...

item.title: Bessent: Tariffs will 'boomerang' back to April levels by Aug. 1 for countries without deals
item.description: President Donald Trump in April announced a 90-day pause on the tariffs he had unveiled just days prior on virtually every major trading partner.

item.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on imports from Japan and South Korea, starting Aug. 1
item.description: The United States will impose 25% blanket tariffs on imports from Japan and South Korea starting Aug. 1, President Donald Trump revealed.

item.title: Dow industrials lower by 500 points as Monday retreat accelerates — follow live
